Method Detail

createEdition

public static <T> T createEdition(javax.persistence.EntityManager em,
                                  TemporalEntity previous)
Create a new edition based on the previous edition (could be current or future continuity as well). All values from the provided BaseEntity are copied into the new one and if the start time is provided both the edition and previous version have their start and end times set accordingly.

Note: This method currently does not validate for date range conflicts. It simply adds the next edition assuming the one passed in was correct an no other future editions exist that will conflict with this addition.

Parameters:
em - EntityManager within a transaction
continuityOrEdition - the BaseEntity to base this new edition on.
start - the time this new edition should start at. This value is set on the new edition and used as the end on the provided entity. If null the times are not left as per TemporalEntity's constructor.
Returns:

createFutureEdition

public static <T> T createFutureEdition(javax.persistence.EntityManager em,
                                        java.lang.Class<?> entityClass)
Create a new entity that is planned to exist at some future time. The entity created will have a start time greater than TemporalEntity#BOT (beginning of time) and will be the continuity as well. The start team is specified by the effective time of the EntityManager specified by its "EFF_TS" property.

Parameters:
em - EntityManager to persist the new edition into
entityClass - the edition or current class
Returns:
the new edition entity
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the "EFF_TS" property is not available.

makeCurrent

public static void makeCurrent(javax.persistence.EntityManager em,
                               TemporalEntity edition)
Make the provided effective temporal entity the current by copying its state into the current and removing the effective one.

Parameters:
em - EntityManager already within a transaction or being used as an extended PersistenceContext
currentEntity -
effectiveEntity -
asOfTS -

isTemporal

public static boolean isTemporal(java.lang.Object result)
Helper method used to determine if an object is Temporal including the case where a collection is provided. In the case of a collection it is assumed that if the first entity is temporal then all elements of the collection are.
